title: Congratulating the Seaford High School Football Team upon the occasion of capturing the Nassau County Conference IV Championship
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating the Seaford High School Football
Team and Coach Rob Perpall upon the occasion  of  capturing  the  Nassau
County Conference IV Championship

WHEREAS,  Excellence  and  success in competitive sports can be achieved
only through strenuous practice, team play and team spirit, nurtured  by
dedicated coaching and strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling  in  them  the  value  of teamwork, encouraging a standard of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play and competition; and
  WHEREAS, The Seaford High School Football Team are the  Nassau  County
Conference  IV  Champions; they defeated the Roosevelt Rough Riders by a
score of 28-25 to earn their fourth straight county title; and
  WHEREAS, The athletic talent displayed by this team is  due  in  great
part  to  the  efforts of Coach Rob Perpall, a skilled and inspirational
tutor, respected for his ability to develop potential  into  excellence;
and
  WHEREAS,  The  team's  overall  record  is  outstanding,  and the team
members were loyally and enthusiastically  supported  by  family,  fans,
friends and the community at large; and
  WHEREAS,  The hallmarks of the Seaford High School Football Team, from
the opening game of the season to  participation  in  the  championship,
were  a brotherhood of athletic ability, of good sportsmanship, of honor
and of scholarship, demonstrating that these team players are second  to
none; and
  WHEREAS,  Athletically  and academically, the team members have proven
themselves to be an unbeatable combination of talents, reflecting favor-
ably on their school; and
  WHEREAS, Coach Perpall has done a superb job in guiding,  molding  and
inspiring the team members toward their goals; and
  WHEREAS, Sports competition instills the values of teamwork, pride and
accomplishment,  and  Coach  Rob Perpall and the outstanding athletes on
the Seaford High School Football Team have clearly made  a  contribution
to  the  spirit of excellence which is a tradition of their school; now,
therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate the Seaford High School Football Team; its members:  Antho-
ny  Marino,  Michael Lasher, Eddie Schaller, Bryan Parson, Peter Adorno,
Joe Kirincic, Daniel Arena, Anthony  Silvestri,  Alex  Rodriguez,  Chris
Trotta,  Joe  Andersen,  Joe  Richards,  Ryan Ward, Nick Fischetti, Nick
Pasco, Travis Langan, John Troisi,  Ryan  Metas,  Tyler  Coplus,  Justin
Buckley,  Trevor  Antonette,  Louis Marzo, Alex Miller, Michael Pantell,
Patrick McGrath, Victor Belgiorno,  Bryan  Podmeyer,  Jared  Saperstein,
Austin  Quiroz,  Matt  Knudsen,  Patrick  Conroy,  Ryan  Gilganic, James
D'Arco, Andrew Brust, Dominic Lomonaco, Anthony Traina, Michael  Giorda-
no,  Tyler Hertz, Robert Fauerbach, Greg Kolodinsky, Matt Hoskin, Andrew
Hoskin, Billy Papadimas, Zachary Pensa, Michael Scialpi, Patrick Murphy,
Peter Ruttura, Jack Brown, John Friscia, Nicholas Gunder, James O'Hagan,
Brian Gilbert and Glen Kennedy, and Coach  Rob  Perpall,  and  Assistant
Coaches  Mike  Corcoran, Tom Casey, George Duquette, John Phillips, Tome
Innis, and Charlie Margiass on their outstanding season and overall team
record; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Seaford High School Football Team and  to  the  aforemen-
tioned coaches.
